TopicTitle: Is anyone else having trouble reaching ksp.olex.biz?

Articles.Content:
I'm reaching it, but my browser's timing out waiting for a response. Anybody else having this problem? I've tried from a few different places in the network (i.e. multiple hosts in different cities). Anyone know who to get a hold of to tell them the site is having problems?

Cheers,

Jack

It is down, yes. For future reference, this is a fantastic site for checking if a site is actually offline: [http://www.downforeveryoneorjustme.com/](http://www.downforeveryoneorjustme.com/)

The easiest way to get ahold of the site's maintainer is to contact them here on the forums. I'm pretty sure the site's maintained by the author of MechJeb.

You can use this one instead, it's much better.

[http://alexmoon.github.io/ksp/](http://alexmoon.github.io/ksp/)
Olex had some minor server issue, it should be back up now.

> 
> I'm pretty sure the site's maintained by the author of MechJeb.

Not quite ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) r4m0n (MechJeb author) was kind enough to include the link in parts of the interface, but the site isn't affiliated with him in any way.
